mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT (pd_name) AS pd_name ,p.PD_NO , p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE, pt.PD_PRICE , ppt.PDPHOTO_LINK, pt.PD_PRICE - (pt.PD_PRICE * p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE/100) AS PD_SALE_PRICE FROM PRODUCTS_BY_DUTY_FREE_SHOP_TB p ,PRODUCTS_TB pt ,PRODUCTS_PHOTO_TB ppt WHERE p.PD_BY_DFS_SALE > 0 AND p.PD_NO = pt.PD_NO AND p.pd_NO = ppt.PD_NO AND ppt.PHOTO_TYPE_NO =1 ORDER BY 3 desc
